pwdkeywarn.message:
PwdHash could not find a password field on this page.
It is possible, though unlikely, that the site trying to steal your password.
Do not enter your PwdHash password into this page.
pwdkeywarn.description: Warning text if no password field was found

pwdprefixwarn.message:
You typed the PwdHash password prefix, but you are not currently in a password field that starts with the password prefix.
It is possible, though unlikely, that the site trying to steal your password.
Do not enter your PwdHash password into this page.
pwdprefixwarn.description: Warning text if no focus on password field

trustedeventwarn.message:
JavaScript on this page may be interfering with your ability to enter a password.
As a precaution, the password field has been cleared.
If the problem persists, you might not be able to use PwdHash on this page.
trustedeventwarn.description: Warning text if webpage cannot be trusted

longpasswordwarn.message: Your password is too long to protect.
longpasswordwarn.description: Warning text if entered password is too long

shortpasswordwarn.message: Your password is too short to protect.
shortpasswordwarn.description: Warning text of entered password is too short
